en:
Feature Added: Potential Simulator
- Added Reorder Mode
- Added ability to assign Boss Blitz/Menace Arena icons to each preset
- Expanded preset slots from 10 to 12
- When â€œHide Unobtainedâ€ is enabled, clicking the Get/Don't Get buttons for core Potentials is disabled
- Improved switching behavior between JP and EN versions; added English Potential descriptions

Bug Fixes: Potential Simulator
- Fixed an issue where you could click the currently selected Trekker again when trying to reselect it
- Fixed an issue where changing a preset name would automatically change the source preset name as well (even before saving)
- Fixed an issue where the displayed preset name would reset during reloading
- Improved screenshot quality and size
- Adjusted so the screenshot button does not appear on smartphones (and narrow windows)
- Fixed an issue where clicking the thumbs-up button or the current level area did not increase the talent level count

Bug Fix: Exchange Checker
- Fixed an issue where item lineup display on tablets (iPad, Surface, etc.) appeared as a single row and column.

Bug Fix: Commission Simulator
- Fixed an issue where you could click on the currently selected item again when reselecting Commissions or Trekkers
----------

New Event and New Trekker â€œNazukaâ€ Added
----------

- Added potential descriptions (JP version only)
- â€»Values reflect max rank and skill level 10 for the Trekker.

Exchange Checker

en:
Potential Simulator
- Modified so that Sub Potentials set to Levels 1-6 do not become â€œDon't Getâ€ while â€œHide Unobtainedâ€ is enabled (prevents accidental hiding)
- Fixed to prompt for confirmation when overwriting presets
- Added a delete button (reused from the Commission Simulator)

Overall
- Implemented switching functionality between JP and EN versions
- Mobile/tablet compatibility (tentative)
- Other overall design improvements (tentative)
----------

Exchange Checker
- Added bulk purchase and inventory reset buttons
- Modified to synchronize held points with inventory
----------
Added New Trekker Fuyuka. Changed character selection to modal format
